meanings.definition: A person who is against or opposes novelists.
meanings.sent1: The antinovelist refused to read any books written by novelists.
meanings.sent2: She was known in the literary community as an antinovelist.
meanings.sent3: The antinovelist joked that reading novels was a waste of time.
meanings.sent4: His book club friends teased him for being an antinovelist.
meanings.sent5: The antinovelist's bookshelf was filled with non-fiction titles only.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to someone who is against or opposes novelists.
meanings.sent1: Her antinovelist views were evident in her scathing book reviews.
meanings.sent2: The magazine published an antinovelist article criticizing modern fiction.
meanings.sent3: The antinovelist critique of the novel was surprisingly insightful.
meanings.sent4: His antinovelist attitude made him unpopular at the writers' conference.
meanings.sent5: The antinovelist perspective offered a fresh take on the literary scene.
